抢帽子（Scalping）这种交易策略重在通过微小的价格变化获利。他们通常在一个价格买入以后，价格有了微小变化使得交易有利可图 …
剥头皮(scalping)交易是指任何在120秒内完成开仓与平仓的快速交易。在普通账户中的剥头皮交易量高于账户总交易量的25%将被扣 …
“抢帽子交易”（Scalping），也称“抢先交易”，是目前世界各国证券市场上重要的违法违规类型之一，一般认为指的是证券机构、专业 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (denoting the skull or cranium): probably of Scandinavian origin

entry.def: Your scalp is the skin under the hair on your head.

example.ex: He smoothed his hair back over his scalp...
Massage the shampoo into the scalp.
example.tran: 通过按摩让洗发香波渗入头皮。

entry.def: To scalp someone means to remove the skin and hair from the top of their head.

example.ex: He pretended to scalp me with his sword.
example.tran: 他假装要用剑剥下我的头皮。

entry.def: A scalp is the piece of skin and hair that is removed when someone is scalped.
If you say that you want someone's scalp, you mean that you want to defeat or punish them.

example.tran: 股票投机商想整他一顿。

example.ex: He told friends I was after his scalp.
example.tran: 他告诉朋友们我想打败他。

entry.def: If someone scalps tickets, they sell them outside a sports ground or theatre, usually for more than their original value.

example.ex: He was trying to pick up some cash scalping tickets.
example.tran: 他那时正想通过倒票赚点儿钱。

means.word_mean: 1. the skin that covers the top of the head;

sentences.sentence: "they wanted to take his scalp as a trophy"

means.word_mean: 1. sell illegally, as on the black market
